name: Escape from Puzzle Mansion
description:
You wandered deep into the abandoned faire, and entered the old Puzzle Mansion.

But as soon as you set foot within, the door locked behind you!

Can you find your way out?

Credits:

Alex Aguilar - Programmer, management, puzzle design

Juan Pablo de la Tijera Obert - Sound designer, designer, scene builder and decorator, video editing, puzzle design

Emily "enistoja" Torres - Programmer, FX, UI management
